channel.title: Zhengxu Yu | Homepage
channel.description: Webpage of Zhengxu Yu (余正旭), yuzhengxu.

item.title: New publication in IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering.
item.description: Our paper “Urban Traffic Light Control via Active Multi-agent Communication and Supply-Demand Modeling” got accepted by IEEE Transactions on Knowledge and Data Engineering.
item.author: Zhengxu Yu

item.title: New publication in IEEE Transactions on Multimedia.
item.description: Our paper “Apparel-invariant Feature Learning for Person Re-identification” got accepted by IEEE Transactions on Multimedia (CCF-B).
item.author: Zhengxu Yu

item.title: New publication on arXiv.
item.description: [link] Our work “Apparel-invariant Feature Learning for Apparel-changed Person Re-identification” is on arXiv now.
item.author: Zhengxu Yu

item.title: New publication on arXiv.
item.description: [link] Our work “Stable Learning via Causality-based Feature Rectification “ is on arXiv now.
item.author: Zhengxu Yu

item.title: Publication in IJCAI-PRICAI'2020 is online now.
item.description: [link] Our paper “MaCAR: Urban Traffic Light Control via active Multi-agent Communication and Action Rectification” publised on IJCAI-PRICAI’2020 is online now. (Acceptence Rate: 12.3% (592/4717))
item.author: Zhengxu Yu

item.title: New publication in IJCAI-PRICAI 2020.
item.description: Our paper “MaCAR: Urban Traffic Light Control via active Multi-agent Communication and Action Rectification” got accepted in IJCAI-PRICAI 2020 (Acceptence Rate: 12.3% (592/4717)).
